law.catch_line: Department of Kentucky State Police to update database within thirty days of receipt of information from certain levels.
law.text:
The Department of Kentucky State Police shall update the centralized criminal history record information system within thirty (30) days of receipt of information. The update shall include information from the:
Offender level;
Arrest level; and
Informational and evaluational level.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 86, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1986.
